description: Create, render, and optimize SVGs with instant PNG previews to verify visual intent. Convert SVGs into React, React Native, PDF, or Data URI formats for easy integration. Validate, format, and extract metadata like dimensions and titles to ensure clean, reliable graphics.

tools.name: render_svg
tools.title: Render SVG
tools.description: Renders SVG code to a PNG image for visual verification. IMPORTANT: You should ALWAYS use this tool to preview your generated or modified SVG code to ensure it correctly fulfills the user's request and matches their visual intent.

width.description: Optional width to resize the output image.

height.description: Optional height to resize the output image.

tools.name: save_svg
tools.title: Save SVG
tools.description: Saves the SVG code to a file on the local system. Note: It is recommended to use 'render_svg' first to verify the visual result before saving.

filename.description: The name of the file to save (e.g., 'icon.svg').

optimize.description: Whether to optimize the SVG using SVGO before saving (default: true).

tools.name: optimize_svg
tools.title: Optimize SVG
tools.description: Optimizes and minifies SVG code using SVGO. After optimization, you should use 'render_svg' to ensure that the visual integrity of the image was maintained.

tools.name: format_svg
tools.title: Format SVG
tools.description: Prettifies (formats) SVG code with consistent indentation and line breaks.

tools.name: svg_to_react
tools.title: SVG to React
tools.description: Converts SVG code to a React Functional Component (JSX). Automatically handles camelCasing for attributes (e.g., stroke-width -> strokeWidth), converts 'class' to 'className', and transforms 'style' strings into React-style objects.

component_name.description: The name of the generated React component (PascalCase recommended).

tools.name: svg_to_react_native
tools.title: SVG to React Native
tools.description: Converts SVG code to a React Native Component using the 'react-native-svg' library. Maps standard SVG tags to their React Native equivalents (e.g., <path> -> <Path>) and ensures attributes are compatible.

component_name.description: The name of the generated React Native component.

tools.name: svg_to_data_uri
tools.title: SVG to Data URI
tools.description: Converts SVG code into a base64-encoded Data URI. Useful for embedding SVGs directly into HTML or CSS as background images.

tools.name: svg_to_pdf
tools.title: SVG to PDF
tools.description: Converts SVG code into a high-quality PDF document.

tools.name: validate_svg
tools.title: Validate SVG
tools.description: Validates SVG code for XML syntax, root element correctness, and standard tag usage. Detects potential rendering issues like missing dimensions or non-standard elements.

tools.name: get_svg_metadata
tools.title: Get SVG Metadata
tools.description: Extracts high-level metadata from SVG code. Provides information like defined width, height, viewBox, and title.
